verses.text: PEA ko eni ia ‘a kinautolu na‘e ‘ai honau nima: ko Nehemaia foha ‘o Hakalaia na‘e kōvana, pea mo Setekaia;
Masaia, Pilikai, Sēmaia; ko ha‘a taula‘eiki ia.
Pea ko ha‘a Līvai eni: ‘io, ‘a Sisua foha ‘o ‘Asanaia, ko Pinui ko e ha‘a Henatati, ko Katemieli.
Ko honau kāinga foki, ‘a Sepanaia, Hōtaia, Kēlita, Pelaia, Hānani,
Ko e hou‘eiki ‘o e kakai eni; ko Pālosi, Pāhati-Moape, ‘Īlami, Satu, Pani,

Pea ko hono toe ‘o e kakai, ‘a e kau taula‘eiki, ‘a e kau Līvai, ‘a e kau le‘o matapā, ‘a e kau hiva, ‘a e kau Netinimi, mo ia fua pē kuo fakamavahe mei he ngaahi kakai ‘o e ngaahi fonua ke nofo ki he Lao ‘a ‘Elohimi, ‘a honau ngaahi uaifi, mo ‘enau fānau tangata mo fānau fefine, ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e lava ke fai ‘ilo;

na‘a nau fā‘ūtaha mo honau kāinga ‘a e hou‘eiki, ‘o nau fai ha tuki faka‘aungafa, mo ha fuakava, ke fou ‘i he Lao ‘a ‘Elohimi; ‘a ia na‘e tuku mai, ‘o fakafai ‘ia Mōsese ko e Sevāniti ‘a ‘Elohimi; ‘io, ke tauhi mo fai ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē ‘a Sihova ko homau ‘Eiki, mo ‘ene konisitūtone, mo ‘ene ngaahi fekau.
Mo eni foki, ke ‘oua te mau ‘ange ‘emau fānau fefine ki he ngaahi kakai ‘o e fonua, ‘o ‘oua ‘e ‘omi ‘enau fānau fefine ke nonofo mo ‘emau fānau tangata.

Pea kapau ‘e ‘omi ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate ‘e he ngaahi kakai ‘o e fonua ‘a e me‘a fakatau, mo e me‘akai, ‘e ‘ikai te mau fakatau meiate kinautolu ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate, pe ‘i ha ‘aho tapu: pea te mau fai ‘a e fakahilita‘u fitu, ‘a e tuku ‘o e kelekele ke fo‘ou, mo e tuku tautau ai ‘a e mo‘ua kotoa.
Pea na‘a mau fokotu‘u tu‘utu‘uni kiate kimautolu ke ‘ange ‘a e vahetolu ‘o e sikeli ‘i he ta‘u kotoa pē ma‘a e ngāue ‘a e fale ‘o homau ‘Otua–

ki he mā fono pea ki he feilaulau-me‘akai tu‘u ma‘u pea ki he feilaulau-mōifua tu‘u ma‘u na‘e fai ‘i he ngaahi Sāpate mo e ngaahi māhina fo‘ou; ki he ngaahi ‘aho tu‘utu‘uni, pea ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku fakatāpui, pea ki he ngaahi feilaulau-angahala ke fai ‘a e fakalelei ma‘a ‘Isileli; ‘io, ki he fatongia kotoa ‘o e fale ‘o homau ‘Otua.

Pea na‘a mau pāloti ki he okooko–‘a e kau taula‘eiki, ‘a e kau Līvai, pea mo e kakai–ki he ‘omi ‘o e kōpano fefie ki he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua, ki he ‘ulumotu‘a mo e taimi tu‘utu‘uni ‘i he ta‘u mo e ta‘u, ke tutu ‘i he funga ‘ōlita ‘o Sihova ko homau ‘Otua, ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi ‘i he Lao.
Pea ke ‘omi ‘a e polopolo ‘o e ma‘ala, mo e polopolo ‘o e ‘akau fua kehekehe, ki he fale ‘o Sihova ‘i he ta‘u mo e ta‘u.

Pea mo e ‘olopo‘ou ‘o ‘emau fānau, mo ‘emau monumanu, ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi ‘i he Lao; ‘io, ‘a e ‘olopo‘ou ‘o ‘emau fanga pulu, mo e fanga sipi mo kosi, ke ‘omi ki he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua, ki he kau taula‘eiki ‘oku fai ‘a e fakafe‘ao ‘i he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua.

Ko e polopolo foki ‘o ‘emau takaonga mā, mo ‘emau ngaahi me‘a hapai, mo e fua ‘o e ngaahi ‘akau kehekehe, ‘a e vaine mo e lolo– te mau ‘omi ia ki he kau taula‘eiki, ki he ngaahi loki ‘o e fale ‘o homau ‘Otua. Pea ko e vahehongofulu ‘o ‘emau ngoue te mau ‘omi ki he kau Līvai; he ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia, ‘a e kau Līvai, ‘oku nau tali ‘a e tukuhau-hongofulu ‘i he ngaahi kolo kotoa pē ‘oku fai ai ‘emau ngoue.

Pea ‘e tu‘u mo e kau Līvai ‘i he‘enau tali ‘a e tukuhau-hongofulu ‘a e taula‘eiki, ko ha ha‘a ‘Ēlone, koe‘uhi ke ‘ohake ‘e he kau Līvai ‘a e vahehongofulu ‘o e vahehongofulu ki he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua, ki he ngaahi loki, ki he fale koloa.

He ko ha‘a ‘Isileli mo ha‘a Līvai te nau fetuku ‘a e uite, mo e uaine, mo e lolo kuo hapai ki he ngaahi loki, ‘a e potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e nāunau ‘o e fale tapu, mo e kau taula‘eiki ‘oku fai ‘a e fakafe‘ao, mo e kau le‘o matapā, mo e kau hiva. Pea ‘e ‘ikai te mau tuku li‘aki ‘a e fale ‘o homau ‘Otua.
